description:
This course is for those seeking to create a business or manifest a dream into reality with no former knowledge on where to start with being an entrepreneur. Whether you want to offer a service or sell a product, Emily will show you all the necessary steps to launch your baby and make it a success!

With this course you will learn the key steps:

  • The *Necessary* Steps to Starting Your Own Business
  • How to Create a Website
  • How to Make Your Business completely Google-Friendly
  • Get the visibility and traffic you need to generate engagement and revenue
  • Understand SEO & Google Keywords
  • Cross-Promotion and Making Friends
  • How to become Social Media Friendly & Connect with Peers
  • How to Create a Blog & Why Free Content Helps You!
  • How to Create an Email Opt-In& Why It is Important to Have an Email List
  • How to Promote Yourself without paying crazy money in Advertising
  • Guerilla Marketing Tips & Tricks

In this course you will learn the *key* steps to manifest that business idea into an actual reality and start making your dreams come true! Take this course if you are a complete newbie or fairly new to business & entrepreneurship!
title: The New Entrepreneur: How To Start a Business You Love!
